extendedInfo.description: In this simple game you just have to touch and clear falling panels.This is the "French maid" series.If you succeed in clearing all the panels you will see a sexy image as a prize.You can double the score if you clear panels in the upper part of the screen!If you clear more than 3 panels in a row a "Combo" will be triggered.Will you be able to master the skills to beat this game?Twitter public id: galskissWe will inform you about updates and stuff.

reviews.title: So so
reviews.comment: Ad a save point, there\'s no way to continue this with out a save point.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ok but....
reviews.comment: its good app but needs a option whefe you can view and save the picture on stages you completed and it be a five star
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid.
reviews.comment: I like hot anime chicks but really, this game is dumb as f*ck. 3 stars for the chicks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: But it would be perfect if you could save your work..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was okay... but no longer works
reviews.comment: No longer works on the Ice Cream Sandwich OS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Dont work on samsung glaxy ace just keeps closing once it opens not good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: There is nothing to this game. Click the pieces and you get to see a half dressed anime girl. Big whoop. There are only around 5 unlockable pictures and once you get them it just restarts. Stupid.
reviews.author: A Google User
